text: is it possible to listen on custom events emitted through inter contract calls via hfc ? (using fabric v0.6)
@jzang <@U0PB67X4K>  If you look at other node modules with sub-modules, the pattern would be fabric-client and fabric-client-ca.
<@U1L2C9F3R>  - I thought about this - but the reality is that `fabric-ca-client` can be used by itself and really is a client for the fabric-ca  :wink:
plus - I don't like to conform either  :wink:
